name: A Message to You
description:
After being separated due to your long distance relationship, you plan a surprise visit for your boyfriend Alexandre. Play to experience a lovely weekend with your very own loving farm boy and uncover a secret of his. 

Play time: 1.5 hours with a normal reading speed.

Features: Choose your player from 4 options, as well as your name. Game includes voluntary nsfw (which is explicitly marked) as well as one automatic illustration and 1 illustration where you must choose the correct dialogue. There is no bad ending, but different ones are available. 

Programmer: MommaG

Artists: MommaG, Minty

Authors: Nova, Lindsey K, Kezia
